sen.j: 山辺皇女（やまのべのひめみこ、663年（天智天皇2年）? - 686年10月25日（朱鳥元年10月3日 (旧暦)））とは天智天皇皇女。
sen.e: Princess Yamanobeno Himemiko (663 - October 25, 686) was an imperial princess of Emperor Tenchi.
Princess Yamanobeno Himemiko (663 - October 25, 686) was an imperial princess of Emperor Tenchi.
Princess Yamanobeno Himemiko (663 - October 25, 686) was an imperial princess of Emperor Tenchi.

sen.j: 母は蘇我赤兄の娘、常陸娘。
sen.e: His mother was Hitachi, a daughter of SOGA no Akae.
Her mother was HITACHI no Iratsume, a daughter of SOGA no Akae.
sen.cmt: 文法を修正し、「常陸娘」の訳を単語リストに揃えました。
sen.e: Her mother was HITACHI no Iratsume, a daughter of SOGA no Akae.

sen.j: 天武天皇皇子の大津皇子の正妃。
sen.e: She was the lawful wife of Prince Otsu, a prince of Emperor Tenmu.
She was the lawful wife of Prince Otsu, a prince of Emperor Tenmu.
She was the lawful wife of Prince Otsu, a prince of Emperor Tenmu.

sen.j: 幼い頃に外祖父の赤兄が壬申の乱で流罪に処される。
sen.e: When she was young, her grandfather Akae was banished at the Jinshin War.
When she was young, her grandfather Akae was banished in the Jinshin War.
sen.cmt: 接続詞を修正しました。
sen.e: When she was young, her grandfather Akae was banished in the Jinshin War.

sen.j: その後、大津皇子の正妃となったが、皇子が謀反の意ありとして捕えられて磐余の自邸で死を賜ったのに殉死。
sen.e: She became the lawful wife of Prince Otsu, but he was arrested because of a rebellion and killed himself in his house in Iware, and she also killed herself.
She became the lawful wife of Prince Otsu, but the Prince was arrested of allegedly having an intention for rebellion and killed himself in his house in Iware, and she also killed herself.
sen.cmt: 言い回しを修正しました。
sen.e: She became the lawful wife of Prince Otsu, but the Prince was arrested of allegedly having an intention for rebellion and killed himself in his house in Iware, and she also killed herself.

sen.j: その様子は『日本書紀』に「被髪徒跣、奔赴殉焉、見者皆歔欷（髪を振り乱して裸足で走り、殉死した。それを見た者は皆嘆き悲しんだ。）」と記されている。
sen.e: "Nihonshoki" (Chronicles of Japan) says that she ran with bare feet and disheveled hair, and killed herself and those who saw her grieved and moaned.
"Nihonshoki" (Chronicles of Japan) says that she ran with bare feet swinging her hair and killed herself, and those who saw her grieved and moaned.
sen.cmt: 言い回しを修正しました。
sen.e: "Nihonshoki" (Chronicles of Japan) says that she ran with bare feet swinging her hair and killed herself, and those who saw her grieved and moaned.
